settings.title: The coolest cafe in the city is

settings.editor: A classic meeting point for coffee lovers and remote workers, in the center of the city!

settings.description_text: Grain has been inspired and brought to life by original coffee lovers who value the quality of the coffee beans.
Awesome, tasty snacks are available all day and night. Vegan and Paleo friendly, only organic and fresh.
Relax with a tasty cocktail from our collection, and enjoy the good vides and atmosphere all around you.

tabs.tab_content: All our ingredients are organically grown, and all meat is by grassfed animals. You may actually use these tabs for any content.

settings.title: You are going to love it here!
